text: "Hello, Goodbye" is a 1967 song by The Beatles as a non-album single. It was released following the death of their manager Brian Epstein. It went to number 1 in Australia, Canada, Denmark, France, Germany, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Sweden, the United Kingdom and the United States. ==References== Category:1967 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:Paul McCartney songs
title: Hello, Goodbye
